name: B.E.S. Leader Nemesis
text: 2+ "B.E.S." monsters This card's ATK is equal to the number of Counters on your side on the field X 300, this card cannot be destroyed by battle. "B.E.F. Zelos" you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. If another "B.E.S." monster(s) is Summoned: Place 1 Counter on that Summoned monster(s). Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 "B.E.S" monster from your hand; destroy 1 monster on the field.
